794520.name: The Maestros: Official Soundtrack
794520.description:
The official soundtrack for The Maestros!

1: Main Theme (5:29)
2: Sacred Arena (8:28)
3: Fissure (3:44)
4: Terra (3:07)
5: Crater (4:05)
6: Sunset Isle (3:07)
7: The Maestros - Trailer Theme (2:04)

The soundtrack is playable through the Steam Media Player. All of the mp3 files will download to "The Maestros - Official Soundtrack" in the folder where Steam installs The Maestros game files (likely Steam\steamapps\common\The Maestros).
794520.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
